name: TIME TRAVELLER TROUBLE
description:
Game off 2022 theme: Clichès 

Clichè chosen: Its all Greek to me

CODE & ART: JAMMIE1THELEGEND SFX, MUSIC & ART: DEEP SOLAR TEAM MANAGER & CO-ORDINATOR: COOLRYAN

CONTROLS:

maze puzzle: WASD

unicycle race puzzle: A & D

washing basket puzzle: move mouse left & right

whack-a-mole: left click mouse where you wanna go

quit: Esc

map: M

TUTORIAL:

Main game: find items that look greek or out of place and click on them

DNA orderer: this is opened when you reach the points  needed for the next clue, you have to put a box representing a section of dna on the right category (you can retry if you get it wrong!)

PUZZLES:

maze: you start at the green exit and need to find your way to and touch the red exit (doesn't reset when you retry)

unicycle race: Keep tapping A & D! if you don't you will fall over and have to restart the puzzle! your goal is to complete the race (progress is shown on the bar on your half of the screen) before the AI

washing collection: your basket has been "greeked" and you need to turn it back! collect falling washing - non greek washing will lower your "greek-ness" and greek washing will increase it. A sound is played when you collect a clothing item that corresponds to whether it was greek or not

whack that mole!: your goal is to knock out the AI with your toilet brush. If you miss, it will regain a point of health, so stay on your toes!
